participant_1.background:

I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates.
i am a scientist.
I wake up and spend some time meditating before I start my day.
my favorite food is a cheeseburger.

i never sleep in.
i like movies based on comedies.

I'm looking for ways to control my blood sugar while still being able to enjoy my active lifestyle.

content.text: Good morning to you too! What are you doing today?
I am going to be meditating for a while and then going to the gym to do some powerlifting training.
That's great! I love working out. I am going to be grilling some meat for my family this weekend.
That sounds delicious. I love cheeseburgers.
Oh me too! I am trying to figure out how to control my blood sugar while still being able to enjoy my active lifestyle.
That's tough. I know there are a lot of great resources out there to help you with that though.
I know. I am trying to find some good ones.
Thanks! What kind of work do you do?
That's awesome! What kind of science do you do?
I study the effects of climate change on plant life.
That's really interesting! I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it sounds like you're doing really important work.
Thanks! I am really passionate about it
